reports.title: Piper At The Gates of Dawn
reports.author: Pink Floyd
reports.reportText: A live  album by the English progressive rock band originally released in 1995, on the label EMI in the United Kingdom.

reports.title: Dilate
reports.author: Ani DiFranco
reports.reportText: Her highest-selling and most acclaimed album, released in 1996.

reports.title: Axis Bold As Love
reports.author: Jimi Hendrix
reports.reportText: Second studio album by the English-American band, released in 1967.
